thread.section_title: Intoxalock Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intoxalock | intoxalock.com | 5 of 217
thread.title: Debby Perkins

author: Debby Perkins
title: Debby Perkins
text: My agent was the best! He answered every question that I asked and did not have to hesitate and look up the answer. He was kind and complete with all the information including fees, calibration, rebate offers and explaining the time range to inform the proper state as needed. He set up my appointment at exactly the time I needed. I would recommend this company to anyone that needs this product.
